Token.Abstract: Perform a series of method calls that insert, delete, or select rows and sections of the receiver.

Parameter.Name: block
Parameter.Abstract: A block combine a series of method calls.

Token.Abstract: Scrolls the receiver until a row or section location on the screen.

Parameter.Name: row
Parameter.Abstract: Row index in section. NSNotFound is a valid value for scrolling to a section with zero rows.

Parameter.Name: section
Parameter.Abstract: Section index in table.

Parameter.Name: scrollPosition
Parameter.Abstract: A constant that identifies a relative position in the receiving table view (top, middle, bottom) for row when scrolling concludes.

Parameter.Name: animated
Parameter.Abstract: YES if you want to animate the change in position, NO if it should be immediate.

Token.Abstract: Inserts a row in the receiver with an option to animate the insertion.

Parameter.Name: row
Parameter.Abstract: Row index in section.

Parameter.Name: section
Parameter.Abstract: Section index in table.

Parameter.Name: animation
Parameter.Abstract: A constant that either specifies the kind of animation to perform when inserting the cell or requests no animation.

Token.Abstract: Reloads the specified row using a certain animation effect.

Parameter.Name: row
Parameter.Abstract: Row index in section.

Parameter.Name: section
Parameter.Abstract: Section index in table.

Parameter.Name: animation
Parameter.Abstract: A constant that indicates how the reloading is to be animated, for example, fade out or slide out from the bottom. The animation constant affects the direction in which both the old and the new rows slide. For example, if the animation constant is UITableViewRowAnimationRight, the old rows slide out to the right and the new cells slide in from the right.

Token.Abstract: Deletes the row with an option to animate the deletion.

Parameter.Name: row
Parameter.Abstract: Row index in section.

Parameter.Name: section
Parameter.Abstract: Section index in table.

Parameter.Name: animation
Parameter.Abstract: A constant that indicates how the deletion is to be animated, for example, fade out or slide out from the bottom.

Token.Abstract: Inserts the row in the receiver at the locations identified by the indexPath, with an option to animate the insertion.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: An NSIndexPath object representing a row index and section index that together identify a row in the table view.

Parameter.Name: animation
Parameter.Abstract: A constant that either specifies the kind of animation to perform when inserting the cell or requests no animation.

Token.Abstract: Reloads the specified row using a certain animation effect.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: An NSIndexPath object representing a row index and section index that together identify a row in the table view.

Parameter.Name: animation
Parameter.Abstract: A constant that indicates how the reloading is to be animated, for example, fade out or slide out from the bottom. The animation constant affects the direction in which both the old and the new rows slide. For example, if the animation constant is UITableViewRowAnimationRight, the old rows slide out to the right and the new cells slide in from the right.

Token.Abstract: Deletes the row specified by an array of index paths, with an option to animate the deletion.

Parameter.Name: indexPath
Parameter.Abstract: An NSIndexPath object representing a row index and section index that together identify a row in the table view.

Parameter.Name: animation
Parameter.Abstract: A constant that indicates how the deletion is to be animated, for example, fade out or slide out from the bottom.

Token.Abstract: Inserts a section in the receiver, with an option to animate the insertion.

Parameter.Name: section
Parameter.Abstract: An index specifies the section to insert in the receiving table view. If a section already exists at the specified index location, it is moved down one index location.

Parameter.Name: animation
Parameter.Abstract: A constant that indicates how the insertion is to be animated, for example, fade in or slide in from the left.

Token.Abstract: Deletes a section in the receiver, with an option to animate the deletion.

Parameter.Name: section
Parameter.Abstract: An index that specifies the sections to delete from the receiving table view. If a section exists after the specified index location, it is moved up one index location.

Parameter.Name: animation
Parameter.Abstract: A constant that either specifies the kind of animation to perform when deleting the section or requests no animation.

Token.Abstract: Reloads the specified section using a given animation effect.

Parameter.Name: section
Parameter.Abstract: An index identifying the section to reload.

Parameter.Name: animation
Parameter.Abstract: A constant that indicates how the reloading is to be animated, for example, fade out or slide out from the bottom. The animation constant affects the direction in which both the old and the new section rows slide. For example, if the animation constant is UITableViewRowAnimationRight, the old rows slide out to the right and the new cells slide in from the right.

Parameter.Name: animated
Parameter.Abstract: YES to animate the transition, NO to make the transition immediate.
